items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Rapid Release cleans hair systems in a flash.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Walker Tape®’s Rapid Release cleans hair systems in a flash. Our fast-acting remover is ideal for solvent soaks and is safe to use on all systems. With a citrus fragrance and an oil base, you won’t have to worry about damaging your hair systems. Get your solvent soaks done faster with Rapid Release.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply directly to skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.storedescription:
Spray on adhesive area. Breakdown will begin in seconds. The release time will depend on adhesive buildup. Remove residue, shampoo and rinse. Not for use on your client’s skin. Apply only to the hair system. Apply generously on adhesive area for best results.


To Do a Solvent Soak: Fill a large bowl or sink with Rapid Release. Place the system into the solvent, base side up. Keep the system submerged and work the adhesive build up off. Wear gloves to keep your hands out of direct contact with the solution. Shampoo the system and rinse. Soak times vary from 5-30 minutes, depending on the type of system and adhesive used.
items.pagetitle: Rapid Release - 128 fl oz, Gallon | Walker Tape
